text: Actually ignore that. When installing the API PHP tools via composer, what directy do I actually want that houses the Factory and such? I want to incorporate it into a WordPress Plugin
Should I just grab the HubSpot folder out of the vendor folder?
Hmm, looks like WordPress doesn't cooperate with the version of GuzzleHTTP in the PHP Library :v

Has anyone attempted to sync email addresses with HubSpot contacts? I have a few emails for one person but it looks like the documentation does not mention anything about multiple emails in the `email` field. I have also tried to update the `hs_additional_emails` but it looks like that is a read-only field.

The forum seems to have the idea posted from back in 2018. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-Edit-Remove-Non-Primary-Emails-from-Contact-API/idi-p/176316>
Is it possible to scope the version of Guzzle with the PHP library
